Class Credit

java.lang.Object
Account
Credit
public class Credit extends Account
The Credit class represents a credit account that extends the Account class. It contains information about the credit account number, credit limit (ma) and the starting balance of the credit account as a BigDecimal.
Version:
1.0.1
Author:
Juan Moreno, Javier Ontiveros
